Brechin city 
2021
Jamie Bain (born 6 August 1991) is a Scottish footballer who plays for Brechin city fc, as a defender.

response: *29 January 2016: The side suffered their first league defeat in 15 league matches, losing 0–1 against Airdrieonians at East End Park, with Diamonds midfielder Jamie Bain scoring the only goal of the match.
